canTransfer(address,address,uint256).details: Check if sender can transfer (lock period expired)

created(address,uint256).details: Called after minting to set lock on recipient

destroyed(address,uint256).details: Called after burning - no action needed for this module

getLockEndTime(address).details: Get the lock end time for an address

getRemainingLockTime(address).details: Get remaining lock time for an address

isLocked(address).details: Check if an address is currently locked

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

transferred(address,address,uint256).details: Called after transfer to set lock on recipient
